title: See You at the Crosswalk
description: “You’re under arrest!” On his first official assignment, police officer Jinho thinks he catches a flasher... only it’s the suave school nurse, Hwanung! One chance encounter quickly develops into something more as Jinho finds himself both excited and flustered by Hwanung’s gestures of affection. Follow their story in this prequel comic to “Stop at the Red Light.”
